lines.text: Every time you push one of those buttons, something happens to me.
Well, I'll tell you what, this time, you push a button.
Alwight.
[laughs]
I think I'll push this wed one.
No! No! No! No! No! Not the wed one! Don't ever push the wed one!
Here's the very last word in garbage disposal units. It's actually ten years ahead of its time.
[Throws garbage in]
Say, that weawwy does the twick, awwight.
And it's so simple. It only has one moving part. Regardez.
[Opens doors under sink to show a pig eating the garbage thrown down the drain]
Say, I'll bet you're tired of looking at those dirty windows.
Well, I, um...
We can take care of that.
[Pushes a button on the panel; a robot covers up a window with bricks]
There. Now you'll never have to look at those dirty windows anymore.
Say, here's a little gadget you're gonna love. Give me that.
[Takes off Elmer's bow tie]
Hey!
[Mechanical arms drop down with a tie]
Ties any knot you want. Bow, four-in-hand, five-in-hand, false granny, Windsor, Schmindsor... Well, let's try this one.
[Pushes button]

[gags as the arms choke him with the tie as a noose]
Help! Get me down!
Whoops! Wrong button. Uh, that's the Alcatraz ascot.
That's the wast stwaw! Pack up all this push-button nonsense and wemove it fwom my pwemises! I'm going upstairs and take an aspiwin.
[Walks over to door, then stops]
My stairway's gone! What have you done with my stairs?
Stairs, schmairs. Come here.
[takes Elmer to a square on the floor]
We don't walk upstairs in the push-button home.
[Steps on a button on the floor]
We bring the upstairs downstairs.
[the top floor comes down around them]
Neat?
But what happens to the downstairs?
Say, that's a good question. What do you say we find out?
[Pushes button again; top floor goes up again, leaving all the downstairs furniture crushed]

[Last lines]
For a small price, I can install this little blue button to get you down.
Say, I wonder what that wed button is for?
[he pushes the red button on the panel that says For Tidal Waves Only, the house raises into sky, Daffy Duck arrives in a helicopter]
For a small price, I can install this little blue button to get you down.
